content:
2021.
 * 2 March - Iona's toybox was updated from 1.21.1 to 1.22.2, including a bug fix.
 * 4 March - Work on the new graphics engine was completed..
 * 15 July - Iona's toybox was updated from 1.22.2 to 1.23.3, using a new version of Fenforge, which includes a new graphics engine, improved text clarity, various performance imrpovements and bug fixes.
 * 14 October - Iona's toybox was updated from 1.23.3 to 1.24.1, using a new version of Fenforge, which included various performance improvements and bug fixes.
 * October - Andrew moves from developing FenForge to Brighter Shores.
